basics.name: Engineering Technician V
basics.summary: I have over 29 years of progressive experience in the electrical, communications, electronics, and telecommunications fields. I have extensive experience in USCG shipboard communications upgrades or installations. I also have over 10 years' experience supporting DGPS installations.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Oversaw major shipboard communications upgrades and was responsible for the planning and performing field implementation. I also provided technical leadership in the Topside Maintenance and Dockside Repair program.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Installed electrical systems for various equipment and conveyors and supervised the maintenance department second shift.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Installed electrical systems at shore and ship sites. Installed and maintained heating, ventilating, air conditioning, and chilled water systems.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Installed various commercial/industrial electrical systems including uninterruptible power supplies, motor generators and switching systems.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Supported commercial, industrial, and residential electrical installations, and performed basic troubleshooting.
